page.title: 12Religion
page.content: Religious observance in the area does not appear to be strong. Of the {89}families surveyed in the school questionnaire{68 families}indicated that{no one attended any religious {meetings.9 families}sent their children to{Sunday School and church but the parents did not accompany them.Out of all the families questioned we found that{3 fathers went to church. We found that all of the churches in our block are Christian and are different in the fact that they belong to different denomination {Church of England,Pentecostal, {Methodist,Jehovah's Witness, {Congregational and Salvation Army. Those members of the Roman Catholic Church in this area are catered for in Irlam.There are no ethnic minorities in the area.
